p: In the treatments without autoclaving, enzyme activity was stopped by heating the bottles in boiling water for 30 min. After 10 min the temperature in the bottles was 70°C. Autoclaving was conducted in a steam sterilizer (GE 6610, Getinge Sterilization AB, Gothenburg, Sweden) for 60 or 120 min at 133°C and 2.4 bar.
